AND zpay_time >= #{startDate} AND #{endDate} >= zpay_time

SELECT zh.* , ap1.auction_title AS order_auction_title , ap2.auction_title AS auction_title , os.order_secondhand_product , s.secondhand_idx , s.member_id AS seller_id , oa.auction_idx AS auctionIdxForOrderAuction FROM ZPAY_HISTORY zh LEFT JOIN ORDER_SECONDHAND os ON zh.order_secondhand_idx = os.order_secondhand_idx LEFT JOIN SECONDHAND s ON s.secondhand_idx = os.secondhand_idx LEFT JOIN ORDER_AUCTION oa ON zh.order_auction_idx = oa.order_auction_idx LEFT JOIN AUCTION_PRODUCT ap1 ON ap1.auction_idx = oa.auction_idx LEFT JOIN AUCTION_PRODUCT ap2 ON ap2.auction_idx = zh.auction_idx WHERE zh.member_id = #{member_id}
AND zpay_deal_type = '충전'
AND zpay_deal_type = '환급'
AND (zpay_deal_type = '중고출금' OR zpay_deal_type = '경매출금' OR zpay_deal_type = '검수비')
AND (zpay_deal_type = '중고입금' OR zpay_deal_type = '경매취소환불' OR zpay_deal_type = '경매입금')
AND zpay_time >= #{startDate} AND #{endDate} >= zpay_time
ORDER BY zpay_time DESC
LIMIT #{startRow} , #{listLimit}
